Package com.dua3.utility.crypt

Class KeyStoreUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.crypt.KeyStoreUtil
public final class KeyStoreUtil extends Object
Utility class for KeyStore operations.

  • Method Details

    • createKeyStore

      public static KeyStore createKeyStore(String type, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Creates a new empty KeyStore of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the KeyStore type ("PKCS12", "JKS", etc.)
      password - the password to protect the KeyStore
      Returns:
      a new empty KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore creation fails

    • createKeyStore

      public static KeyStore createKeyStore(char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Creates a new empty KeyStore using the default type (PKCS12).
      Parameters:
      password - the password to protect the KeyStore
      Returns:
      a new empty KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore creation fails

    • loadKeyStore

      public static KeyStore loadKeyStore(InputStream inputStream, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a KeyStore from an InputStream.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - the InputStream containing the KeyStore data
      password - the password to decrypt the KeyStore
      Returns:
      the loaded KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore loading fails

    • loadKeyStoreFromFile

      public static KeyStore loadKeyStoreFromFile(Path keystoreFile, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Loads a KeyStore from a file.
      Parameters:
      keystoreFile - the path to the KeyStore file
      password - the password to decrypt the KeyStore
      Returns:
      the loaded KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore loading fails
      IOException - if file I/O fails

    • saveKeyStore

      public static void saveKeyStore(KeyStore keyStore, OutputStream outputStream, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Saves a KeyStore to an OutputStream.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to save
      outputStream - the OutputStream to write to
      password - the password to encrypt the KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore saving fails

    • saveKeyStoreToFile

      public static void saveKeyStoreToFile(KeyStore keyStore, Path keystoreFile, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Saves a KeyStore to a file.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to save
      keystoreFile - the path to save the KeyStore to
      password - the password to encrypt the KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if KeyStore saving fails
      IOException - if file I/O fails

    • storeSecretKey

      public static void storeSecretKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, SecretKey key, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Stores a SecretKey in the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to store the key in
      alias - the alias for the key
      key - the SecretKey to store
      password - the password to protect the key
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if storing the key fails

    • storeKeyPair

      public static void storeKeyPair(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, KeyPair keyPair, Certificate[] certificateChain, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Stores a KeyPair with a certificate chain in the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to store the key pair in
      alias - the alias for the key pair
      keyPair - the KeyPair to store
      certificateChain - the certificate chain for the public key
      password - the password to protect the private key
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if storing the key pair fails

    • loadSecretKey

      public static SecretKey loadSecretKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a SecretKey from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the key from
      alias - the alias of the key
      password - the password to decrypt the key
      Returns:
      the loaded SecretKey
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the key fails or key is not found

    • loadPrivateKey

      public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a PrivateKey from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the key from
      alias - the alias of the key
      password - the password to decrypt the key
      Returns:
      the loaded PrivateKey
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the key fails or key is not found

    • loadPublicKey

      public static PublicKey loadPublicKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a PublicKey from the KeyStore (from the certificate).
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the key from
      alias - the alias of the key
      Returns:
      the loaded PublicKey
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the key fails or key is not found

    • loadKeyPair

      public static KeyPair loadKeyPair(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a KeyPair from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the key pair from
      alias - the alias of the key pair
      password - the password to decrypt the private key
      Returns:
      the loaded KeyPair
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the key pair fails or keys are not found

    • storeCertificate

      public static void storeCertificate(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, Certificate certificate) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Stores a certificate in the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to store the certificate in
      alias - the alias for the certificate
      certificate - the certificate to store
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if storing the certificate fails

    • loadCertificate

      public static Certificate loadCertificate(KeyStore keyStore, String alias) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a certificate from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the certificate from
      alias - the alias of the certificate
      Returns:
      the loaded certificate
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the certificate fails or certificate is not found

    • loadCertificateChain

      public static Certificate[] loadCertificateChain(KeyStore keyStore, String alias) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Loads a certificate chain from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to load the certificate chain from
      alias - the alias of the certificate chain
      Returns:
      the loaded certificate chain
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if loading the certificate chain fails or chain is not found

    • containsKey

      public static boolean containsKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Checks if the KeyStore contains an entry with the specified alias.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to check
      alias - the alias to check for
      Returns:
      true if the KeyStore contains the alias, false otherwise
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if checking the KeyStore fails

    • deleteKey

      public static void deleteKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Deletes an entry from the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to delete the entry from
      alias - the alias of the entry to delete
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if deleting the entry fails

    • listAliases

      public static Set<String> listAliases(KeyStore keyStore) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Lists all aliases in the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to list aliases from
      Returns:
      a set of all aliases in the KeyStore
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if listing aliases fails

    • generateAndStoreSecretKey

      public static void generateAndStoreSecretKey(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, SymmetricAlgorithm algorithm, int keySize, char[] password) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Generates a secret key and stores it in the KeyStore.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to store the secret key in
      alias - the alias for the secret key
      algorithm - the symmetric algorithm
      keySize - the key size in bits
      password - the password to protect the key
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if key generation or storage fails

    • generateAndStoreKeyPairWithX509Certificate

      public static void generateAndStoreKeyPairWithX509Certificate(KeyStore keyStore, String alias, AsymmetricAlgorithm algorithm, int keySize, char[] password, String subject, int validityDays) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Generates a key pair and stores it in the KeyStore with a proper self-signed X.509 certificate. This method creates a standards-compliant X.509 certificate using available security providers.
      Parameters:
      keyStore - the KeyStore to store the key pair in
      alias - the alias for the key pair
      algorithm - the asymmetric algorithm
      keySize - the key size in bits
      password - the password to protect the private key
      subject - the certificate subject (e.g., "CN=MyApp, O=MyOrg, C=US")
      validityDays - number of days the certificate should be valid
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException - if key generation or storage fails
      UnsupportedOperationException - if no suitable provider for X.509 certificate generation is available
